item.description:
Come on out and see Paul Erlick and 3 friends play a FREE SHOW at the Burren!
Located in Davis Square in Somerville, MA. Parking is between Elm and Orchard st.

The Burren


Paul Erlick has been playing gigs of several different generes (Jazz, Rock, blues etc) for years.
To Learn more of Paul's musical influences and listen to some of his music checkout Paul's Myspace page.

Paul's MySpace

The band starts around 9pm and plays till 1am.
They are playing in the back room at the Burren.
If you are interested the Burren serves food till 9pm I believe, not a bad place to get a bite to eat before the show. There is also good indian food, and other dinning choices close by.
If there is enough interest we could make plans to get something to eat either at the Burren or elsewhere.

Let me if your interested in gettting something to eat before the show.
Hope to Meetup with some of you there.
E-mail me if you have any questions...
item.how_to_find_us: The back room at the Burren is not that big a venue. I should be easy to find there. I would be glad to provide my cell phone to any meetup members that would like it.
item.why: Every band I have seen Paul play with has been well worth the effort to go see. While I'm not certain exactly what they will playing in regards to songs, I'm sure attending will prove both worthwhile and interesting.
item.name: Paul Erlick and a few friends
